name: Security

---

## Security Goal
What security property does this change enforce?
(e.g. confidentiality, integrity, availability)

## Threat Model
What attack does this defend against?

## Tasks
- [ ] Implement secure logic
- [ ] Add validation and safe defaults
- [ ] Add audit logging
- [ ] Add rate limiting / safeguards if applicable
- [ ] Add security-focused tests

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Threat is mitigated
- [ ] No sensitive data logged or stored
- [ ] Failure cases are safe
- [ ] Tests simulate the attack scenario

## Notes
Links to references (OWASP, RFCs, etc.)
